record.dc:title: 61MG31 Hiwassee Island Site 37MG31, Meigs County, Tennessee. 37MG31 - Earth mound. Feature 23, a ramp which led from the base of the mound to Level C. Same as photograph 60MG31, except that photograph was made from top of excavation. Direction north.
record.wpa:narrative: Ramp is narrow and irregular and forms a crude foot path from base of mound to level C at the height of Features 21 - 22. The surface is of hard packed and slightly burnt sand and contrasts to the soft unpacked sand fill of the mound.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustration on file at the institution. See also photograph 60MG31 [fhm01178].
